1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | RDF-to-Koshucode converter.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuRdf
6  ( koshuRdfMain
7    -- * koshu-rdf.hs
8    -- $koshu-rdf.hs
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Data.List                as List
12import qualified Data.Map                 as Map
13import qualified Data.RDF                 as RDF
14import qualified Data.Text                as Tx
15import System.Console.GetOpt
16
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                  as S
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                    as D
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.RDF     as L
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Version as L
22
23
24
25-- ----------------------  Main
26
27-- | The main function for @koshu-rdf@ command.
28koshuRdfMain :: IO ()
29koshuRdfMain = do
30  (opts, files) <- parseCommand =<< B.progAndArgs
31  checkOptions opts
32  mapM_ (convert opts) files
33
34data Option
35    = OptHelp
36    | OptVersion
37    | OptTurtle
38    | OptXml
39    | Opt2
40    | Opt3
41      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord, Enum, Bounded)
42
43options :: [OptDescr Option]
44options =
45    [ Option "h" ["help"]     (NoArg OptHelp)    "Print help message."
46    , Option "V" ["version"]  (NoArg OptVersion) "Print version number."
47    , Option "t" ["turtle"]   (NoArg OptTurtle)  "RDF format is Turtle."
48    , Option "x" ["xml",
49                  "rdfxml"]   (NoArg OptXml)     "RDF format is RDF/XML."
50    , Option "2" ["binary"]   (NoArg Opt2)       "Binary export (/s /o)"
51    , Option "3" ["ternary"]  (NoArg Opt3)       "Ternary export (/s /p /o)"
52    ]
53
54checkOptions :: [Option] -> IO ()
55checkOptions opts | more opts [OptTurtle, OptXml] =
56  B.putFailure "choose one of -n -t -x"
57checkOptions opts | more opts [Opt2, Opt3] =
58  B.putFailure "choose one of -2 -3"
59checkOptions _ = return ()
60
61more :: (Eq a) => [a] -> [a] -> Bool
62more opts = isMultiple . List.intersect opts
63
64isMultiple :: [a] -> Bool
65isMultiple []   = False
66isMultiple [_]  = False
67isMultiple _    = True
68
69parseCommand :: (String, [String]) -> IO ([Option], [String])
70parseCommand (prog, argv) =
71    case getOpt Permute options argv of
72      (opts, _, [])
73          | has OptHelp    -> B.putSuccess usage
74          | has OptVersion -> B.putSuccess version
75          where has = (`elem` opts)
76                version = "koshu-rdf-" ++ L.versionString
77      (opts, [], [])       -> return (opts, ["-"])
78      (opts, files, [])    -> return (opts, files)
79      (_, _, errs)         -> B.putFailure $ concat errs
80    where
81      usage  = usageInfo header options
82      header = unlines
83               [ "USAGE: " ++ prog ++ " [option ...] [file ...]"
84               , "  Convert RDF to Koshucode."
85               , "  If no files are given, read standard input."
86               , ""
87               ] ++ "OPTIONS:"
88
89
90
91-- ----------------------  Conversion
92
93convert :: [Option] -> FilePath -> IO ()
94convert opts path
95    | OptXml `elem` opts = write RDF.XmlParser
96    | otherwise          = write RDF.TurtleParser
97    where
98      write parser = writeRdf opts $ readRdfGraph (parser Nothing Nothing) path
99
100type Graph = RDF.MGraph
101
102writeRdf :: [Option] -> IO Graph -> IO ()
103writeRdf opts graph =
104  do g <- graph
105     let js  = L.judgesFromRdf (tupleType opts) g
106         RDF.PrefixMappings pmap = RDF.prefixMappings g
107         pre = map unpackPair $ Map.toList pmap
108     writeJudges pre js
109
110unpackPair :: (Tx.Text, Tx.Text) -> (String, String)
111unpackPair (a, b) = (Tx.unpack a, Tx.unpack b)
112
113tupleType :: [Option] -> L.RDFTupleType
114tupleType opts
115    | Opt2 `elem` opts = L.RDFTuple2
116    | otherwise        = L.RDFTuple3
117
118readRdfGraph :: (RDF.RdfParser p) => p -> String -> IO Graph
119readRdfGraph parser "-" =
120    do str <- getContents
121       let rdf = RDF.parseString parser $ Tx.pack str
122       return $ RDF.fromEither rdf
123readRdfGraph parser path =
124    do rdf <- RDF.parseFile parser path
125       return $ RDF.fromEither rdf
126
127writeJudges :: [S.ShortDef] -> [D.JudgeC] -> IO ()
128writeJudges sh js =
129    do putStrLn B.emacsModeComment
130       putStrLn ""
131       writeShort sh
132       let mixes = B.mixShortEncode (S.shortText sh) <$> js
133       B.putMixLines D.judgeBreak mixes
134
135writeShort :: [S.ShortDef] -> IO ()
136writeShort [] = return ()
137writeShort sh =
138    do putStrLn "short"
139       mapM_ putShort sh
140       putStrLn ""
141    where
142      putShort (short, long) = putStrLn $ "  " ++ short ++ " " ++ show long
143
144
145
146-- ----------------------
147-- $koshu-rdf.hs
148--
149-- @koshu-rdf@ command is implemented using 'koshuRdfMain'.
150--
151-- > import Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuRdf
152-- > 
153-- > main :: IO ()
154-- > main = koshuRdfMain
155
